blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: Tbh I actually prefer Dan’s absence than Phil’s videos who don’t even seem genuine or made because he truly wanted to. He just...
question: Tbh I actually prefer Dan’s absence than Phil’s videos who don’t even seem genuine or made because he truly wanted to. He just does the same old things and panders to fans with mentions of dan.
answer: I feel like the Dan mentions aren’t really “pandering.” Considering they literally live together so there’s a good chance that Dan is a part of most of the stories Phil tells.

reblog.comment: I feel like the Dan mentions aren’t really “pandering.” Considering they literally live together so there’s a good chance that Dan is a part of most of the stories Phil tells.

trail.content_raw: I feel like the Dan mentions aren’t really “pandering.” Considering they literally live together so there’s a good chance that Dan is a part of most of the stories Phil tells.
trail.content: I feel like the Dan mentions aren’t really “pandering.” Considering they literally live together so there’s a good chance that Dan is a part of most of the stories Phil tells.

title: Boyfriend
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2GK6K0f

by TortiTabby

“You love me like a very best friend but I don’t want to be your secret anymore”

Dan glanced over the spinning bottle at his, for lack of a better term, best friend.
He supposes he should be happy it isn’t just flatmate but he couldn’t help but crave for a title, for something concrete that he could hold onto.

Dan and Phil are friends with benefits.

Words: 1989, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of Tumblr Songfic Prompts

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester
  • Additional Tags: Friends With Benefits, Angst with a Happy Ending, Light Smut, Songfic


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2GK6K0f

blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: Storms/Thunderstorms (3) Masterlist
body:
part one, part two

I Am The Calm Before The Storm (ao3) - gravityy

Summary: Dan and Phil are used to sleeping on a tour bus, considering they’re right in the middle of a tour. But Phil isn’t used to sleeping in a tour bus in the middle of a storm, and Dan isn’t used to sleeping in a tour bus with a terrified Phil plastered to his side.

I know I’m safe - crayziimaginations

Summary: It’s a stormy afternoon and Dan recalls the time Phil comforts him from the storm.

If Tomorrow Never Comes - phan-panda

Summary: There’s a tornado heading straight for the Dan and Phil flat. With the inevitable storm on the horizon, Dan knows this could be his last chance to tell Phil how he really feels.

Learning To Dance In The Rain - uhnonniemiss

Summary: Phil is afraid of thunderstorms, and after he comes home crying one day, Dan decides to help.

Little Bit Scared (ao3) - Vampgirl236

Summary: Little Dan is scared of the dark.

Miles and The Rain (ao3) - phanburnhamizzard

Summary: While shopping downtown, a violent summer thunderstorm whipped up around Dan and Phil, who quickly took refuge in a Starbucks to wait it out. Phil spots a white dog, shaking and shivering in the middle of the street, and immediately bolts outside to rescue it.

Noise (Good Ending) (ao3) - Huffleclawrox

Summary: Dan loves Phil and takes care of him while he recovers. Phil is thankful and comes to him one night during a thunderstorm.

Rainy Day (ao3) - teddyreads11277

Summary: Dan and Phil finally decide to make a coming out video. But what happens when they do it during a thunderstorm and Dan gets scared in the middle of filming?

Storm - bittersweetphan

Summary: After fighting, a huge storm blows over London, and Phil finds himself not being able to sleep without his bear.

Storm (ao3) - gggghik

Summary: Dan wakes up to a thunderstorm and cuddles closer to Phil.

Storms and Card Games - placingglaciers

Summary: Well…there is a storm and somehow a card game is involved???

Summer Storms - huphilpuffs

Summary: Phil loves thunderstorms.

The Dark Side Of Spring (ao3) - spaceandvinyls

Summary: Dan and Phil had an argument and Dan calms down outside. It starts to rain and fluff ensues.

The Stranger In The Woods - pasteldanhowells

Summary: Dan is on his way to his friends house when a storm hits and he gets lost in the middle of the woods where there’s clearly no one around and no way for him to get help. At least, that’s what he thinks until he sees a cabin with lights on inside. Dan had been in a hurry before but after meeting the stranger who lives in the cabin, he might like to stay a bit longer.

When You Least Expect It - omgdatphantho

Summary: In the town of Havenshire lives a clan of shapeshifters. Enter Dan, the youngest son of the Alpha. He has one desire: to find his mate. Enter Phil, a human looking to make a new start in Havenshire. Their worlds will collide as a large storm bears down on them.

Summary: Little Dan is scared of the dark.

Miles and The Rain (ao3) - phanburnhamizzard

Summary: While shopping downtown, a violent summer thunderstorm whipped up around Dan and Phil, who quickly took refuge in a Starbucks to wait it out. Phil spots a white dog, shaking and shivering in the middle of the street, and immediately bolts outside to rescue it.

Noise (Good Ending) (ao3) - Huffleclawrox

Summary: Dan loves Phil and takes care of him while he recovers. Phil is thankful and comes to him one night during a thunderstorm.

Rainy Day (ao3) - teddyreads11277

Summary: Dan and Phil finally decide to make a coming out video. But what happens when they do it during a thunderstorm and Dan gets scared in the middle of filming?

Storm - bittersweetphan

Summary: After fighting, a huge storm blows over London, and Phil finds himself not being able to sleep without his bear.

Storm (ao3) - gggghik

Summary: Dan wakes up to a thunderstorm and cuddles closer to Phil.

Storms and Card Games - placingglaciers

Summary: Well…there is a storm and somehow a card game is involved???

Summer Storms - huphilpuffs

Summary: Phil loves thunderstorms.

The Dark Side Of Spring (ao3) - spaceandvinyls

Summary: Dan and Phil had an argument and Dan calms down outside. It starts to rain and fluff ensues.

The Stranger In The Woods - pasteldanhowells

Summary: Dan is on his way to his friends house when a storm hits and he gets lost in the middle of the woods where there’s clearly no one around and no way for him to get help. At least, that’s what he thinks until he sees a cabin with lights on inside. Dan had been in a hurry before but after meeting the stranger who lives in the cabin, he might like to stay a bit longer.

When You Least Expect It - omgdatphantho

Summary: In the town of Havenshire lives a clan of shapeshifters. Enter Dan, the youngest son of the Alpha. He has one desire: to find his mate. Enter Phil, a human looking to make a new start in Havenshire. Their worlds will collide as a large storm bears down on them.

summary: Ya know when you have a song from a musical stuck in your head but it’s like one of the “sexy” or “seduction” songs so then you...
body:
Ya know when you have a song from a musical stuck in your head but it’s like one of the “sexy” or “seduction” songs so then you just have to go through your day with that song in your head while like doing class work and listening to lectures.

This might just be a me problem
